name: Laura (PolyWeld)
description:
Top-down, stealth single-player 3D about WWI in the Azores.

Laura is about a little girl looking for her dad who was taken to a concentration camp on Terceira Island in the Azores, during WWI in Portugal.

Main Features:
  • Learn about the events during WWI in the Azores;
  • Help Laura to find her father;
  • Interact with the environment: play with animals and search for plants.
  • Discover the landscape and beauty of the Azores.
Controls:

Point and click - left click.
